Detailed Description

This class implements most the code an AI would need to interface with the lower-level game code. AIs should extend this class to get a lot of builer-plate code out of the way. The provided AI class does just that.

Member Function Documentation

int BaseAI.dropTime ( ) [inline]

The amount of turns it takes to orbitally drop per tile away from the player's respective edge.

Returns:
Returns the amount of turns it takes to orbitally drop per tile away from the player's respective edge.

abstract bool BaseAI.run ( ) [pure virtual]

This is run every turn.

Returns:
Return true to end turn, false to resynchronize with the server and run again.

Implemented in AI.
